forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
